Html:
Hi

I'm struggling with my c# implementation which uses the NAudio library

Is there API documentation available? Would be easier to understand the classes...

Ta

hi, the documentation for NAudio can be found in the Documentation section above, and also in the many blog-posts I have written about NAudio. In addition, all the public classes and methods of NAudio have XML documentation which should show up as intellisense. Also, I made a Pluralsight course (subscribers only I'm afraid) which goes into a lot of depth.
